p: For extrinsic apoptosis, cells were treated 2 hpi or 2 hbi with TNFα (10 ng.mL −1) and cycloheximide (10 µg.mL −1) (TNFα/CHX). The addition of cycloheximide prevents the activation of NFkB and the inhibition of apoptosis [ 24]. Drugs were added as indicated in the figure legends, before quantification of cell death.
